title: These Men Fled War in Syria to Ukraine. Now Theyâ€™ve Fled Again.
description: Two men displaced from Syria as civil war gripped their country spent a decade living in limbo in Ukraine. But when war came to them again, they were forced to leave, eventually making their way to London.
dc:creator: Megan Specia
media:credit: Andrew Testa for The New York Times
media:description: Muhsen Hamed, left, and Abdul Safwa, two Syrians who fled Ukraine at the start of the war there. Now in London, they face a complicated path toward rebuilding their lives.
